text: Alireza Rajaei () is an Iranian journalist. He is considered as one of the member of the Nationalist-Religious alliance of Iran. He was elected as a member of parliament by people of Tehran in the sixth Iran parliamental election in 2000, however, after recounting votes and voiding hundreds of thousands of votes by Guardian Council he couldn't afford to go to Majlis. In 2003 Iranian local elections, he was placed 21st in Islamic City Council of Tehran and elected as an alternative member, but never took office. ==References== Category:Iranian journalists Category:Living people Category:Iranian religious-nationalists Category:1962 births Category:Iranian elected officials who did not take office
title: Alireza Rajaei
